title: Victoria 2
notes: To launch it requires you to switch filenames for v2game.exe and victoria2.exe. Once launched, the menu will not continue past "Loading Graphics".

title: Victoria 2
notes: victoria2.exe and v2game.exe must have filenames switched. The game must be run with the /tmp/proton_run script once the names are switched.
specs: i3-4030U / Intel Haswell Mobile Integrated Graphics

title: Victoria II
notes: To run you have to bypass paradox launcher - switch names v2game.exe  and victoria2.exe . Some audio stuttering on startup.

title: Victoria II
notes: Trick with changing name of launcher and game works. Minor issues with alt-tabing. Otherwise runs perfectly.

title: Victoria II
notes: Changing file names (v2game.exe and victoria2.exe) makes the game start and play intro video, but shortly after it shuts down in loading screen.

title: Victoria II
notes:
To work, you need to go to the Victoria II folder in common, and move v2game.exe to victoria2.exe to launch the game directly instead of using the launcher (which is broken on 64 bit WINE builds).
Just doing that worked for some people, in my case I have to use the /tmp/proton_run script to get the game to work.
I have not yet been able to get the in-game music to work. This is the only issue left as far as I can tell.

title: Victoria II
notes: Possibly requires 32-bit installation of WINE/Proton, has dependencies that may be required to run properly like .NET framework and such

title: Victoria II
notes: Only works if you rename V2game.exe to victoria2.exe.

title: Victoria II
notes: Crash at launch, the methods of switching victoria2.exe and V2Game.exe let me see the intro video and the loading screen then it crashes again

title: Victoria II
notes: Launcher and Game exe's must have their names swapped around in order to launch the game (the launcher does not even open). Minor stutter when scrolling the around the map in-game.

title: Victoria II
notes: Change file names trick work, alt-tab work after change to borderless (although have to wait for a few seconds)

title: Victoria II
notes: After recent steam client / proton update the only thing that's needed is to rename v2game.exe to victoria2.exe - even music works!

title: Victoria II
notes: Rename victoria2.exe to victoria2-old.exe / Rename v2game.exe to victoria2.exe
